title: MISSING MY 400 FREE RP FROM LVL 3 OR 5
body: I LVLED UP AT LVL 5 AND STILL DIDNT GET MY FREE 400RP , WHY IS THIS HAPPENING ?? I WANT MY FREE RP TO BUY XP BOOST PLS TY .RESOLVE THIS PLS SO UNFAIR

replies.body: About 3 months ago we replaced the new player 400 RP bonus with a special Hextech Chest.  Can check out our announcement for more information [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)!  Let me know if you have any additional questions :D
You make it seem like this is a good thing. Why is it a good thing? One hextech chest is not equivalent to 400 RP

I actually thought this was a really interesting question soooo be warned of long post ahead :3  PREPARE YOURSELF!

I think it depends on your perspective. For the sake of discussion, I'll explain my thought process on it, with the disclaimer that I'm not, nor have I ever been, a part of any marketing or ecommerce team. I don't know everything that went into this decision, but I can see ways in which the change is a good thing.

On one hand, I'd agree with you that 400 RP (or any RP really) is inherently more valuable than a piece of content mostly due to the flexibility of choice that it provides. Even if you can't buy any piece of content with 400 RP, it can contribute to those pieces of content.  And in a vacuum, I don't think this is a bad thing.  Providing this stepping stone is pretty awesome, and I thought it was pretty neat that we did it.  But it does have its flaws.

Whenever the possibility of free content comes up, the question of "How can this be abused?" is always quick to follow.  With RP this is especially relevant as it's a "jack of all trades" type of content.  It can't be too much and be easily abused with people creating a thousand smurfs just to gift content to their main accounts and can't be too small to feel absolutely meaningless.

By being more specific and less "general" with the content we're giving out we get a sort of "double whammy" in that we're able to provide content that's more meaningful (getting content you can use immediately vs. currency that you may not know how to spend efficiently) as well as reducing the potential for abuse.  As the post linked earlier mentions, by not having to worry about the guaranteed 400 RP the door is open for us to run things like low cost promotions.

At the end of the day, it's really a trade off.  The New Player Chest may have a lower perceived value (I imagine RP will always be perceived as more valuable), but it removes blockers for us to experiment with other types of promotions.

Sorry for the lengthy post (ended up a lot longer than I intended x.x), but hope you enjoy the perspective :D
THANK YOU for the perspective. REALLY THANK YOU IT it really helps.
Yeah, except players such as myself that have been around longer got a free hextech chest AND the 400 starting RP.
And those of us who have been around even longer had to level our accounts to 30 twice and never got RP for it at all.

And then you remember Garen is free by following Riot on Twitter.

So the chest is giving you content that was already free (Garen), which devalues it even more.

I can see what you're getting at, but I don't really agree.  Having multiple ways of getting a specific piece of content doesn't devalue the content itself.  There could be some differences in perceived value, but I'm of the opinion it's mostly veteran players, not new players, who have this different perception.

There's also something to be said by not having players go to a platform they may or may not use or even want to use.
